content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's begin. What is your initial offer for the rental price of the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to start with an offer of 600 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me, Max. I am looking for a higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can increase my offer. How about 650 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a price more in line with the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer again?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I can do that. How about 700 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer one more time?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can do that. How about 750 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is better, but still not what I am looking for. I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer one last time?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 800 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [800] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
